name: Medieval Machiavelli
description:
Medieval Machiavelli is a sandbox prototype to a much bigger game.

A game where you are the magical architect of a castle in construction. Your magic powers are fueled by dust, dust which in turn creates new construction pieces. Use these pieces to grow your castle and complete Kingly Heralds. These quests will reward you with more dust, allowing you to keep going.

Next to that, certain combinations of tiles will reform into unique shapes. 

Every once in a while special buildings will appear, which can be used to further specify and improve your castle!
